entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Consider storing syntax trees with document text for opened documents #57020
  • Test plan for "semi-auto-properties" #57012
    17.1
  • Named mutex bug on .NET using Mono runtime causing compile server OOM #57002
    17.1
  • System.ArgumentException from BuildDeclarationCompilationFromInProgressAsync #57000
  • Project subsetting for OOP sync may be breaking with open source generated files #56998
    17.1
  • Open generated file didn't go live again once the file was present again #56997
    17.1

Closed

  • String duplication concatenating a StringBuilder #57006
    17.0
  • 'override' completion not working for source generated methods in Visual Studio 2022 #56702
    17.0
  • Parse tree round tripping broken on Linux #30212
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • BoundConvertedSwitchExpression - do not store Conversion in the node. #57022
    Area-Compilers
  • Exclude the traits file from codeowners #57021
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add missing commits that weren't in the blame ignore #57019
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do not translate ConnectionLostException to OperationCanceledException #57018
    Area-IDE
  • Set JsonRpc.ExceptionStrategy to ExceptionProcessing.ISerializable #57017
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57016
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • EE: ignore modules with bad metadata headers #57015
    Interactive-Debugging
  • Add a workspace experiment knob to allow us to disable recoverable text. #57014
    Area-IDE
  • Record status for "Semi-auto-properties" #57013
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • BoundForEachStatement - use BoundConversion nodes to represent conversions in the node. #57010
    Area-Compilers
  • Workaround sign check failures #57007
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked
  • Log unexpected cancellation state in RemoteCallback<T> #57005
    Area-IDE
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix named mutex workaround for .NET Mono runtime #57003
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't offer to simply to an alias if it has a different meaning #57001
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Use bulk unsubscribe operations in FileChangeWatcher #55890
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Tighten enforcement of naming convention for local functions #56680
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56999
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use document options to create a correct EOL in file header code fix #56993
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • BoundUsingLocalDeclarations/BoundUsingStatement - don't store Conversion in the node. #56954
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57008
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57009
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #56931
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge main-vs-deps into snappy #57011
    Area-Infrastructure, Needs UX Triage
  • Only pass the lsp misc files workspace for non-VS scenarios. #56989
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add more completion External Access APIs for F# and TS #56972
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Don't break if we fork a snapshot after freezing partial semantics #56890
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Remove unnecessary options #56984
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56996
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56995
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57024
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57023
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • BoundNullCoalescingOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent left operand conversion. #54538
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle switch expressions inside function pointer invocations. #56991
    Area-Compilers
  • Reimplement the logic for remove-unnecessary-cast. #56932
    Area-IDE
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56842
    Area-IDE
  • Merge features/snappy/nodelay to main-vs-deps #55078
    Area-Infrastructure, Needs UX Triage
  • BoundCompoundAssignmentOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54472
    Area-Compilers
  • Use ReadOnlySpan properties over array fields #56845
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • BoundAsOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #56941
    Area-Compilers
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Revert https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/56314 #56986
    Area-IDE
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
